title: A Hotel Experience to Forget
text: NOTHING IS ACCEPTABLE at this hotel, which seems like a family business. It was a child of about 10 years of age who checked us in. The lobby is small, looks very old, and unclean. The shower and telephone did not work; the TV doesn't even have a remote. The location is completely "offside", as it is located on a dark and sparse little street. My advice to other travelers: DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL.
